front.title: BGP Prefix Origin Validation State Extended Community

abstract.t: As part of the origination AS validation process, it can be desirableto automatically consider the validation state of routes in the BGPdecision process. The purpose of this document is to provide aspecification for doing so. The document also defines a new BGPopaque extended community to carry the validation state inside anautonomous system to influence the decision process of the IBGPspeakers.
